channel.title: [Rune-Evolution v2] Assistance " Player Rights + NPC's Invisible "
channel.description:
Anyone able to assist me with this
Player's Right's - ive given my self admin in all the area's needed and when i do
* setrights 2 Name nothing happens give tried the following
::setrights2 Name ::setrights 2 Name "`" Setrights2 Name "`" Setrights 2 Name
ect.... it just does not want to give me the crown.
as for all my Monster NPC's E.g Rock crabs and other Trainable NPC's there all Missing . how do i Fix this?
If you could Assist me over skype that would be lovely
Skype: Jitzbra
Cheers

item.title: [Rune-Evolution v2] Assistance " Player Rights + NPC's Invisible "
item.dc:creator: @Learning_Code Learning Code
item.description:
@Learning_Code wrote:

Half of your problem is because Fox decided to release his server half-assed

You need to code in the crowns and monsters.

Head up - You should probably install MySQL as well since his server requires it to load prices

Read full topic
item.source: [Rune-Evolution v2] Assistance " Player Rights + NPC's Invisible "
